resources.string: In which year was Udacity founded?
What were the first courses offered on Udacity?
Who was the first industry partner to collaborate with Udacity on Nanodegree (ND) programs?
Name the YouTube star Udacity has worked with for their Deep Learning ND course
Who among the following are collaborating with Udacity on Self-Driving Car ND program?
CS231n: Convolutional Neural Networks for Visual Recognition
Thank you for taking the Udacity Quiz. You have scored:
". Please scroll down for the correct answers."

Udacity is a for-profit organization founded in the year 2011 by Sebastian Thrun, David Stavens, and Mike Sokolsky. Headquartered in Mountain View, CA; CS 101 and CS 371 were the first courses offered by this start-up.AT&T joined hands with Udacity in the year 2014 to start the Nanodegree program, and in the year 2016, Udacity announced a nanodegree in the self-driving car technology with four hiring partners (which has increased to nineteen and still counting). And the YouTube superstar is Siraj Raval.
